summary: Apple Fix Pros is a US-based company specializing in the Apple ecosystem. Their core business revolves around three pillars: selling new and certified refurbished Macs and accessories, providing repair services with genuine parts, and operating a wholesale parts division for other businesses. They emphasize their certifications, including R2V3 and multiple ISO standards, and highlight their B2B capabilities as a major parts supplier to over 7,000 service providers and repair centers. The company serves both consumers and businesses, offering local repair in Citrus Heights/Roseville, CA, and nationwide mail-in services. They have helped over 29,000 customers since 2019 and stock over 800 genuine parts.
